items.name: Tomato Basil Soup
items.desc: Fresh pureed tomato soup with real butter, fresh basil leaves, and heavy cream

items.name: Squash Puree Soup
items.desc: Squash blended with garam masala, coconut cream, and fresh tomato, garnished with pumpkin seeds

items.name: Broccoli Cheese Soup
items.desc: Chopped broccoli and cheddar cheese, with sliced mushrooms and onions sauted in white wine

items.name: Organic Garden Vegetable Soup
items.desc: Chef's selection of locally-sourced organic seasonal garden vegetables and pearled barley, simmered in a flavorful tomato broth with garlic and basil

items.name: Simple Salad
items.desc: Arugula, cherry tomatoes, cucumbers, red onions, crunchy hemp seeds, and a balsamic vinaigrette

items.name: Fresh Tahini Salad
items.desc: Arugula, cherry tomatoes, cucumbers, and a creamy tahini dressing

items.name: Arugula And Parmesan
items.desc: Arugula, fresh parmesan, sweet mustard vinaigrette

items.name: Taco Salad
items.desc: Arugula, red onions, cherry tomatoes, crispy tamales, fresh avocado, and our guassacaca dressing

items.name: Yellow Coconut Curry
items.desc: Yellow curry with roasted rainbow carrots, kabocha squash, yams, butternut squash, cauliflower, zucchini, and brown rice in a sweet yellow coconut curry sauce

items.name: Pumpkin Curry
items.desc: Savory and medium spiced japanese sweet pumpkin curry with roasted rainbow carrots, kabocha squash, yams, butternut squash, cauliflower, zucchini, and brown rice

items.name: Garlic Roasted Vegetables
items.desc: Our garlic roasted vegetables with braised spinach and brown rice, served with a side of our tahini or white sauce

items.name: Faux Orange Chicken
items.desc: Breaded cauliflower florets, bell peppers, onions, zucchini, and mushrooms tossed in a sweet orange glaze served over brown rice

items.name: Grilled Cheese Tomato Soup Combo
items.desc: Grilled muenster and cheddar cheese sandwich on multigrain wheat bowl of tomato basil soup

items.name: Spinach Veggie Wrap
items.desc: Organic wheat wrap with mushrooms, organic spinach, asiago, guacamole, pico de gallo, salsa on the side

items.name: Veggie Burger
items.desc: Vegan beef burger on a brioche bun with smoked applewood cheddar, tomato, argula, and garlic pickle slices
